node.BaseCode: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <hibernate-mapping xmlns="urn:nhibernate-mapping-2.2" namespace="@NameSpace.Domain.BusinessObjects" assembly="@NameSpace.Domain"> <class name="@NameSpace.Domain.BusinessObjects.@TableName, @NameSpace.Domain" table="[dbo].[@TableName]" lazy="true"> <id name="Id" column="[Id]"> <generator class="assigned" /> </id> @Property </class> </hibernate-mapping>
